metadata.Title: CVE-2023-4015 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - high
metadata.Description: A use-after-free vulnerability in the Linux kernel's netfilter: nf_tablescomponent can be exploited to achieve local privilege escalation. On anerror when building a nftables rule, deactivating immediate expressions innft_immediate_deactivate() can lead unbinding the chain and objects bedeactivated but later used. We recommend upgrading past commit0a771f7b266b02d262900c75f1e175c7fe76fec2.

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
linux-lts-xenial: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
